name: Institute on Aging Friendship Line
description: The Friendship Line is the only accredited 24/7 crisis line specifically for older adults, providing emotional support, crisis intervention, and friendly conversation.
fullDescription: The Friendship Line is the only accredited 24/7 crisis line specifically for older adults, providing emotional support, crisis intervention, and friendly conversation.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 crisis support for seniors
- Friendly conversation and companionship calls
- Grief support
- Elder abuse reporting assistance
- Referrals to local services
- Support for loneliness and isolation
howToGetIt: Call 415-752-3778 or toll-free 1-800-971-0016 anytime. Free and confidential for adults 60+.
